system.description:
Trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal.

Effect: On hit, all valid targets are @Affliction[grounded] 5.

Requirement: [Tinkaton] Z-Power-Crystal as an Accessory Item and Gigaton Hammer on the user's Active List.
